  • Method Details

    • gameLoopInit

      public void gameLoopInit()

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Javafx initialization method for the game loop scene, it calls 2 inner methods. One that deals with board and bookshelves, the other one with the goals.

    • refreshScene

      public void refreshScene()

    • showBookshelves

      public void showBookshelves() throws IOException
      It launches a new javafx thread and show a new panel showing other players' bookshelf.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException if an I/O error occurs while switching the scene.

    • loadTileImage

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image loadTileImage(Card card)
      Loads and returns the corresponding Image for a given Card.
      Parameters:
      card - The Card for which to load the Image.
      Returns:
      The Image associated with the Card.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect()
      Refills the client's bookshelf with the cards that were previously stored. This method retrieves the client's bookshelf and inserts the cards into the bookshelf grid. Each non-null card is represented by an ImageView and inserted into the bookshelf grid at the corresponding coordinates. This method is called when a client reconnects to the game.
